communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records (FOI/PA) 5 U.S.C. § 552, 555a, THE SUNSHINE ACT
5 U.S.C. § 552b:

All Customer Revenue's given from Geo Group to the Dept. of Homeland Security,ICE,HSI, U.S. Marshalls Service and the Bureau of Prisons along with the FBI and Washington State District Court's. 

Along with revenue generated per year from ankle monitors per state along with GPS to Radio Frequency.  And the company Geo Group purchases these said devices through purchase manifests/receipts.

Harris Corporation any manifests/receipts obtained and given.

This request also pertains to other headquarters outside of the State of Florida and in the United States for collection of manifests/purchase receipts.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Erick
